name: edge-js
description: Edge.js: run .NET and Node.js in-process on Windows, Mac OS, and Linux

scripts.build-edgejs-dll-osx: dotnet restore ./src/double/Edge.Js && dotnet build -c Debug --no-incremental ./src/double/Edge.Js && cp /Users/sean/Documents/Development/edge/src/double/Edge.js/bin/Debug/netstandard1.6/EdgeJs.dll /Users/sean/.nuget/packages/Edge.js/6.5.1/lib/netstandard1.6/ && cp /Users/sean/Documents/Development/edge/src/double/Edge.js/bin/Debug/netstandard1.6/EdgeJs.pdb /Users/sean/.nuget/packages/Edge.js/6.5.1/lib/netstandard1.6
scripts.build-env-osx: export npm_config_runtime=electron && export npm_config_target=1.6.2 && export npm_config_target_arch=x64 && export npm_config_disturl=https://atom.io/download/electron
scripts.build-osx: npm run build-edgejs-native-osx && npm run build-edgejs-dll-osx
